Posts.Title: Questions about After Bilateral Mastectomy hlya lifegoeson

Posts.Content: Apr 24, 2009 07:46PM Tanyar wrote: I will be going in April 28 for bilateral with te reconstruction and am concerned about how to handle all of it.  I keep telling everyone it's okay and what will be will be but underneath I am quaking.  Have cooked enough food to feed a small nation this week.  54 and healthy until this diagnosis. I have asked my parents not to come so they are upset with me.  Husband and married daughter will be with me.  Type A personality I always take care of everyone else and have never before put my self first...  Any saged words of advice from the sisterhood?
Posts.Title: Going for surgery april 30th...terrified aaronali12 aaronali12
